title: bsospace/blog-bsospace-mono-repo
summary: [On goging] BSO Space Blog is a  web-based Q&A system that answers questions based on blog articles using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG). It combines powerful semantic search with a Large Language Model (LLM) like LLaMA3 to provide accurate, context-aware answers grounded in actual content.

title: ricard1406/Little_MCP
summary: A simple yet powerful local AI assistant that runs entirely on your machine. Built for learning and experimentation, Little MCP combines the power of open-source LLMs with advanced Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) to create an intelligent chatbot that can work with your personal documents and provide real-time information

title: LearningCircuit/local-deep-research

title: arieltolazurita/demo-llm-integration
